channel.title: F Money
channel.description: Learn the personal finance lessons you wish you’d been taught in high school! In this engaging weekly podcast, we tackle essential money topics to help you take control of your finances. With three distinct perspectives—a seasoned accountant, a hobbyist investor, and a curious learner—we break down budgeting, investing, saving, and more in a way that’s practical, relatable, and fun.
channel.itunes:author: Dan, Sarah, Jon
channel.itunes:summary: Learn the personal finance lessons you wish you’d been taught in high school! channel.itunes:keywords: personal finance, budgeting, investing, retirement, comedy

item.title: Trailer
item.itunes:title: Trailer
item.description:
Trailer - Episodes coming soon!

Learn the personal finance lessons you wish you’d been taught in high school! In this engaging weekly podcast, we tackle essential money topics to help you take control of your finances. We will try to land a few jokes as well.

https://fmoney.fm

item.title: Sarah Needs a Budget
item.itunes:title: Sarah Needs a Budget
item.description:
• About the Show
  • Link to Budget Template on Google Sheets

This is a short one!  

On this episode, we walk through Sarah's copy of the budget template and see if there is any room to save money on her non negotiable expenses. Join us as we run through the numbers and have a few laughs.
item.content:encoded:
• About the Show

item.title: Analyze Your Spending Habits (Mini)
item.itunes:title: Analyze Your Spending Habits (Mini)
item.description:
In this week's mini episode, Dan runs solo.
He has a couple of follow up items from the previous episode and takes you through how to analyze your spending habits.

Follow along and create your budget with our template. Make a copy and fill in your budget.
Google Sheet

item.title: Sarah's Spending Habits a.k.a. The Redacted Number
item.itunes:title: Sarah's Spending Habits a.k.a. The Redacted Number
item.description:
Join Sarah, Dan, and Jon as they walk through Sarah's spending habits (a.k.a. The Redacted Number).


Disclaimer:
The information provided in this podcast is for educational and informational purposes only and should not be construed as financial advice. We recommend consulting with a qualified financial advisor or conducting your own research before making any financial decisions. item.title: Track Dat Money
item.itunes:title: Track Dat Money
item.description:
Join Sarah, Jon, and Dan as they talk about how to track your finances. Should you use an app or build your own? How often should you update your tracking? How do you look for trends?

2025 Budget Template

Apps Mentioned (not sponsored):
- YNAB (You Need a Budget): https://www.ynab.com
- Rocket Money: https://www.rocketmoney.com


Disclaimer:  
The information provided in this podcast is for educational and informational purposes only and should not be construed as financial advice. The content is based on personal opinions and experiences and may not be suitable for your individual financial situation. We recommend consulting with a qualified financial advisor or conducting your own research before making any financial decisions. The hosts and guests of this podcast are not liable for any losses or damages that may arise from following the information presented. All investments involve risk, including the potential loss of principal. Past performance is not indicative of future results.

item.title: Savings 1 - Stuffing the Piggy Bank
item.itunes:title: Savings 1 - Stuffing the Piggy Bank
item.description:
Join Sarah, Jon, and Dan as they discuss the 20/30/50 rule, emergency funds, high yield savings accounts, and money markets.

Disclaimer:  
The information provided in this podcast is for educational and informational purposes only and should not be construed as financial advice. item.title: Investing 1 - Don't Commit Wire Fraud!
item.itunes:title: Investing 1 - Don't Commit Wire Fraud!
item.description: Join Sarah, Jon, and Dan as they lay the foundation for a conversation about investing. We discuss the types of accounts, different brokerage options, and types of securities you might buy.

item.title: Investing 2 - Just Say No to Tax Evasion
item.itunes:title: Investing 2 - Just Say No to Tax Evasion
item.description:
Join Sarah, Jon, and Dan as they tackle part 2 of investing. We talk about what you might want to invest your money in and different strategies you can research.

Disclaimer:
The information provided in this podcast is for educational and informational purposes only and should not be construed as financial advice.
